  • Feb 14, 2026: Added Turn Out Pac
  • Feb 14, 2026: Updated parking suggestions and public transportation options.

  • Feb 16, 2026: Added nearby events to 1000 District Ave Protests
  • Feb 16, 2026: Added Featured menu item
  • Feb 17, 2026: Added new and updated resources:
    • Lunch Time Activism: Join us for lunch after Mon, Tue, and Wed protests to write postcards, collate materials for immigrants, and plan future actions.
    • Donate Food & Winter Clothes: Bring shelf-stable food, winter clothing, and hygiene products to Mon–Fri protests, or donate directly to Toni Matloff via Venmo or cash. Greatest needs: tea, coffee, cooking oil.
    • ICE Out of Merrimack, Sat Feb 21: Learn about and support the ICE Out of NH campaign and upcoming events.
    • North Carolina and Texas Text Bank w/ VoteRiders (virtual): Help TX and NC voters get the ID info they need for the primaries.
    • No Kings Rally – March 28: 1000 District Ave protest. Details TBD.
    • Many new actions, events, and donation opportunities in the full action list.
